member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to PolicyKey cannot be changed once set; or (when using the default value after the PolicyKey property has been accessed..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A severe error occurred on the current command. The results, if any, should be discarded..

member.name: P:Cadru.Polly.Resources.Strings.SqlServer_DuplicatedPolicies
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There are duplicate policies configured. When using WithDefaults, you don't need to also include WithCircuitBreaker, WithOverallTimeout, or WithTransientErrors..

member.name: P:Cadru.Polly.Resources.Strings.SqlServer_InvalidTimeoutConfiguration
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A TimeoutPerRetry policy is configured without any Retry policies..

member.name: P:Cadru.Polly.Resources.Strings.SqlServer_LoggingMessage_CircuitBroken
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Database operation circuit broken, next retry in {@1}, exception: {@2}.

member.name: P:Cadru.Polly.Resources.Strings.SqlServer_LoggingMessage_CircuitReset
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Database operation circuit reset..

member.name: P:Cadru.Polly.Resources.Strings.SqlServer_LoggingMessage_RetryFailure
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Database operation retry attempt {@0}, exception: {@1}..

member.name: P:Cadru.Polly.Resources.Strings.SqlServer_LoggingMessage_Timeout
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Database operation timed out, exception {@0}..

member.name: P:Cadru.Polly.Resources.Strings.SqlServer_NoPoliciesConfigured
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There are no policies configured..

member.name: T:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingMode
member.summary: Defines the possible throttling modes in SQL Database.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingMode.NoThrottling
member.summary: Corresponds to the "No Throttling" throttling mode, in which all SQL statements can be processed.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingMode.RejectUpdateInsert
member.summary: Corresponds to the "Reject Update / Insert" throttling mode, in which SQL statements such as INSERT, UPDATE, CREATE TABLE, and CREATE INDEX are rejected.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingMode.RejectAllWrites
member.summary: Corresponds to the "Reject All Writes" throttling mode, in which SQL statements such as INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, CREATE, and DROP are rejected.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingMode.RejectAll
member.summary: Corresponds to the "Reject All" throttling mode, in which all SQL statements are rejected.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingMode.Unknown
member.summary: Corresponds to an unknown throttling mode whereby throttling mode cannot be determined with certainty.

member.name: T:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingType
member.summary: Defines the possible throttling types in SQL Database.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingType.None
member.summary: Indicates that no throttling was applied to a given resource.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingType.Soft
member.summary: Corresponds to a soft throttling type. Soft throttling is applied when machine resources such as, CPU, I/O, storage, and worker threads exceed predefined safety thresholds despite the load balancerâ€™s best efforts.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingType.Hard
member.summary: Corresponds to a hard throttling type. Hard throttling is applied when the machine is out of resources, for example storage space. With hard throttling, no new connections are allowed to the databases hosted on the machine until resources are freed up.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingType.Unknown
member.summary: Corresponds to an unknown throttling type in the event that the throttling type cannot be determined with certainty.

member.name: T:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottledResourceType
member.summary: Defines the types of resources in SQL Database that may be subject to throttling conditions.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottledResourceType.PhysicalDatabaseSpace
member.summary: Corresponds to the "Physical Database Space" resource, which may be subject to throttling.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottledResourceType.PhysicalLogSpace
member.summary: Corresponds to the "Physical Log File Space" resource, which may be subject to throttling.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottledResourceType.LogWriteIoDelay
member.summary: Corresponds to the "Transaction Log Write IO Delay" resource, which may be subject to throttling.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottledResourceType.DataReadIoDelay
member.summary: Corresponds to the "Database Read IO Delay" resource, which may be subject to throttling.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottledResourceType.Cpu
member.summary: Corresponds to the "CPU" resource, which may be subject to throttling.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottledResourceType.DatabaseSize
member.summary: Corresponds to the "Database Size" resource, which may be subject to throttling.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottledResourceType.WorkerThreads
member.summary: Corresponds to the "SQL Worker Thread Pool" resource, which may be subject to throttling.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottledResourceType.Internal
member.summary: Corresponds to an internal resource that may be subject to throttling.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottledResourceType.Unknown
member.summary: Corresponds to an unknown resource type in the event that the actual resource cannot be determined with certainty.

member.name: T:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingCondition
member.summary: Implements an object that holds the decoded reason code returned from SQL Database when throttling conditions are encountered.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingCondition.ThrottlingErrorNumber
member.summary: Gets the error number that corresponds to the throttling conditions reported by SQL Database.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingCondition.throttledResources
member.summary: Maintains a collection of key/value pairs where a key is the resource type and a value is the type of throttling applied to the given resource type.

member.name: F:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingCondition.sqlErrorCodeRegEx
member.summary: Provides a compiled regular expression used to extract the reason code from the error message.

member.name: P:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingCondition.Unknown
member.summary: Gets an unknown throttling condition in the event that the actual throttling condition cannot be determined.

member.name: P:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingCondition.ThrottlingMode
member.summary: Gets the value that reflects the throttling mode in SQL Database.

member.name: P:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingCondition.ThrottledResources
member.summary: Gets a list of the resources in the SQL Database that were subject to throttling conditions.

member.name: P:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingCondition.IsThrottledOnDataSpace
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether physical data file space throttling was reported by SQL Database.

member.name: P:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingCondition.IsThrottledOnLogSpace
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether physical log space throttling was reported by SQL Database.

member.name: P:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingCondition.IsThrottledOnLogWrite
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether transaction activity throttling was reported by SQL Database.

member.name: P:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingCondition.IsThrottledOnDataRead
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether data read activity throttling was reported by SQL Database.

member.name: P:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingCondition.IsThrottledOnCpu
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether CPU throttling was reported by SQL Database.

member.name: P:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingCondition.IsThrottledOnDatabaseSize
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether database size throttling was reported by SQL Database.

member.name: P:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingCondition.IsThrottledOnWorkerThreads
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether concurrent requests throttling was reported by SQL Database.

member.name: P:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingCondition.IsUnknown
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether throttling conditions were not determined with certainty.

member.name: M:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingCondition.FromException(Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlException)
member.summary: Determines throttling conditions from the specified SQL exception.
member.param: The object that contains information relevant to an error returned by SQL Server when throttling conditions were encountered.
member.returns: An instance of the object that holds the decoded reason codes returned from SQL Database when throttling conditions were encountered.

member.name: M:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingCondition.FromError(Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlError)
member.summary: Determines the throttling conditions from the specified SQL error.
member.param: The object that contains information relevant to a warning or error returned by SQL Server.
member.returns: An instance of the object that holds the decoded reason codes returned from SQL Database when throttling conditions were encountered.

member.name: M:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingCondition.FromReasonCode(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines the throttling conditions from the specified reason code.
member.param: The reason code returned by SQL Database that contains the throttling mode and the exceeded resource types.
member.returns: An instance of the object holding the decoded reason codes returned from SQL Database when encountering throttling conditions.

member.name: M:Cadru.Polly.Sql.SqlServer.ThrottlingCondition.ToString
member.summary: Returns a textual representation of the current ThrottlingCondition object, including the information held with respect to throttled resources.
member.returns: A string that represents the current ThrottlingCondition object.
